MDE module failed to execute with status @{result('For_each_IP_in_IPs')[0]['outputs'][0]['outputs']['statusCode']}

body.Query:
DeviceLogonEvents 
| where Timestamp > ago(@{triggerBody()?['LookbackInDays']}d)
| where LogonType in ("Interactive","RemoteInteractive")
| where AccountSid == "@{coalesce(item()?['RawEntity']?['sid'],item()?['onPremisesSecurityIdentifier'])}" 
| distinct DeviceId
| summarize ListIds=make_list(DeviceId)
| project List=array_concat(ListIds,pack_array("default"))

let IPLookUp = "@{items('For_each_IP_in_IPs')['Address']}";
DeviceNetworkInfo
| where Timestamp > ago(@{triggerBody()?['LookbackInDays']}d)
| summarize arg_max(Timestamp,*) by DeviceId
| extend IPs = todynamic(IPAddresses)
| mv-expand IPs
| evaluate bag_unpack(IPs)
| where IPAddress == IPLookUp
| summarize ListIds=make_list(DeviceId)
| project List=array_concat(ListIds,pack_array("default"))
